Reviews.Title: “One hotel but 3 locations - potentially confusing”

Reviews.Content: booked additional night center hotel follow tour booking checking told nights 10 mins told change night evening told change center hotels corner pretty inconvenient hot airconditioning tv activated reception locality grubby riddled graffiti theres bit train tram noise otherwise ok stay rome

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, good location - would recommend it”
Reviews.Author: helenagee
Reviews.Content: hotel 10 minutes termini walk left straight station hotel clean fresh towels etc everyday staff friendly map checked told attractions location easiest station manzoni night map found colloseum 15 minute walk straight road breakfast nice mornings round corner left restaurants people maybe arent walking feels alot stations etc boyfriend 20s found distance perfect streets bit grubby city doesnt definitely recommend hotel mirror bathroom isnt easy youre getting ready tip vatican 8am queues time

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay & I'm a fussy american”

Reviews.Content: location train station metro walk bit 10 minutes cleaned day clean towels towels day shower little tricky teeny tiny water pressure im 56 fussy fine wonderful continental breakfast staff safe walking night hotel center 2 corner hotel center 1 absolutely perfect highly recommend
